data.message: This is me, I am Stan. Resurrected from the 90's in a blue collar neighbor hood just like you wanted it man, I have a daughter, Avery, She is beautiful, but we can't understand, why her mom is a Junkie, Avery wants out out of it too man, Can U come back with the same life u used to give us hope again?  Maybe help us cope again? where  have you been? Head lights was ok,  We keep playing it over and over again. I attached a letter she wrote i hope it will give you some light, Isnt this the reason you started all this any way, right? 6 page letter from her heart to her mom, this is the first page the rest is a bomb. Thats why we cant sender this. She can't render this, need help from above thats why i wrote you this letter, much love,
